fields.name: Review_Criteria_Conventional
fields.fieldText: Review Criteria

fields.name: Review_Criteria_Conventional_Display
fields.fieldText: The advisability of approval of a Conventional Rezoning application is a matter committed to the legislative discretion of the Town Council, and is not controlled by any one factor. In determining whether to adopt or deny a rezoning application, the Town Council may weigh the relevance of and consider the following:

fields.name: X1_Whether_the_proposed_rezoning_advances_the_public_health_safety_or_welfare
fields.fieldText: 1. Whether the proposed rezoning advances the public health, safety, or welfare;

fields.name: X2_Whether_and_the_extent_to_which_the_proposed_rezoning_is_appropriate
fields.fieldText: 2. Whether and the extent to which the proposed rezoning is appropriate for its proposed location, and is consistent with the purposes, goals, objectives, and policies of the Town’s adopted policy guidance;

fields.name: X3_Whether_an_approval_of_the_rezoning_is_reasonable_and_in_the_public_interest
fields.fieldText: 3. Whether an approval of the rezoning is reasonable and in the public interest; and

fields.name: X4_Other_factors_as_the_Town_Council_may_determine_to_be_relevant
fields.fieldText: 4. Other factors, as the Town Council may determine to be relevant.

fields.name: Review_Criteria_Conditional
fields.fieldText: Review Criteria

fields.name: Review_Criteria_Conditional_Display
fields.fieldText: The advisability of approving a Conditional Rezoning application is a matter committed to the legislative discretion of the Town Council and is not controlled by any one factor. In determining whether to adopt or deny a proposed Conditional Rezoning, the Town Council may weigh the relevance of and consider the following:

fields.name: X1_If_the_application_is_consistent_with_the_applicable_standards_in_Section_3_3
fields.fieldText: 1. If the application is consistent with the applicable standards in Section 3.3, Conditional Zoning Districts;

fields.name: X2_Whether_the_proposed_Conditional_Rezoning_advances_the_public_health_safety_o
fields.fieldText: 2. Whether the proposed Conditional Rezoning advances the public health, safety, or welfare;

fields.name: X3_Whether_and_the_extent_to_which_the_proposed_Conditional_Rezoning_is_appropri
fields.fieldText: 3. Whether and the extent to which the proposed Conditional Rezoning is appropriate for its proposed location, and is consistent with the purposes, goals, objectives, and policies of the Town’s adopted policy guidance;

fields.name: X4_Whether_an_approval_of_the_Conditional_Rezoning_is_reasonable_and_in_the_publ
fields.fieldText: 4. Whether an approval of the Conditional Rezoning is reasonable and in the public interest;

fields.name: X5_Whether_and_the_extent_to_which_the_Concept_Plan_associated_with_the_Conditio
fields.fieldText: 5. Whether and the extent to which the Concept Plan associated with the Conditional Rezoning is consistent with this Ordinance; and

fields.name: X6_Any_other_factors_the_Town_Council_may_determine_to_be_relevant
fields.fieldText: 6. Any other factors the Town Council may determine to be relevant.
